name: com.naukri.inspector-maid
author: Naukri
description:
This is a custom tool for Unity's Inspector, featuring the following key characteristics:

• Utilizes UIElements for rendering, making UI development more straightforward and flexible.

• Allows direct display of properties and methods in the Inspector interface, simplifying data access and modification.

• Supports multiple drawers for the same field, facilitating adjustment and configuration of various field properties.

• Nested UI decorator structure for orderly combining multiple drawers.

• Offers parameter binding functionality, enabling dynamic UI changes based on bound parameters.

samples.description: The usage and samples of each attribute
